nightelement.h

00001 // This may look like C code, but it is really -*- C++ -*-
00002 #ifndef NIGHTELEMENT__H
00003 #define NIGHTELEMENT__H
00004 
00005 class Night;
00006 
00008 template <class Element> class NightElement : public Element {
00009 public:
00011   NightElement(): night(NULL) {};
00012   NightElement(const Element &AnElement): Element(AnElement), night(NULL) {};
00013   NightElement(const Night *ANight): Element(), night(ANight) {};
00014   NightElement(const Element &AnElement, const Night *ANight) : Element(AnElement), night(ANight) {};
00015   ~NightElement(){};
00016   const Night* night;
00017   NightElement* Clone() const {return new NightElement(*this);}
00018   friend bool ByIncreasingSeeing(const NightElement<Element> *one, const NightElement<Element> *two)
00019   {
00020     return (one->night->seeing < two->night->seeing);
00021   }
00022   
00023   friend bool ByIncreasingTime(const NightElement<Element> *one, const NightElement<Element> *two)
00024   {
00025     return (one->night->julianDate < two->night->julianDate);
00026   }
00027 };
00028 
00029 
00030 
00031 #endif // NIGHTELEMENT__H
